code: @Test public void setRuntimeContext() throws Exception {     RuntimeContext mockRuntimeContext = Mockito.mock(RuntimeContext.class).     // Make sure setRuntimeContext of the rich output format is called     RichOutputFormat<?> mockRichOutputFormat = Mockito.mock(RichOutputFormat.class).     new OutputFormatSinkFunction<>(mockRichOutputFormat).setRuntimeContext(mockRuntimeContext).     Mockito.verify(mockRichOutputFormat, Mockito.times(1)).setRuntimeContext(Mockito.eq(mockRuntimeContext)).     // Make sure setRuntimeContext work well when output format is not RichOutputFormat     OutputFormat<?> mockOutputFormat = Mockito.mock(OutputFormat.class).     new OutputFormatSinkFunction<>(mockOutputFormat).setRuntimeContext(mockRuntimeContext). }
